Key Match Events: Baltimore Orioles took a big early lead on their way to a 9-0 victory over the White Sox
Chicago White Sox dropped to 31-109 and became the first team since 1900 with at least three losing streaks of 12 games in the same season
Grady Sizemore, Chicago’s interim manager, was ejected for the first time since taking over
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox are 11 defeats shy of tying the 1962 New York Mets for the most losses since 1900
The Orioles retook the AL East lead, moving a half-game ahead of the Yankees
Others: Cade Povich struck out 10 while pitching into the eighth inning
Ryan O’Hearn and Anthony Santander hit consecutive RBI doubles in the first inning
Chicago White Sox starting pitcher Nick Nastrini allowed four hits and six walks in 1 2/3 innings
